title.rendered: Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) vs Bangalore:  Fantasy Cricket Tips, Pitch Report, Playing XIs for Today’s Match: Indian T20 League 2022

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

LSG vs Bangalore Pitch Report

Out of the last 10 matches at Dr DY Patil Sports Academy in Navi Mumbai, 6 have been won by the teams chasing. Once again, dew is expected to make life challenging for the spinners.

LSG Vs Bangalore Probable Playing XIs

Probable XI for Lucknow Super Giants(LSG): KL Rahul (c), Quinton de Kock*(wk), Manish Pandey, Deepak Hooda, Marcus Stoinis*, Ayush Badoni, Jason Holder*, Krunal Pandya, Dushmantha Chameera*, Avesh Khan, Ravi Bishnoi

Probable XI for Bangalore: Faf du Plessis* (c), Anuj Rawat, Virat Kohli, Glenn Maxwell*, Shahbaz Ahmed, Dinesh Karthik (wk), Suyash Prabhudessai, Wanindu Hasaranga*, Harshal Patel, Josh Hazlewood*, Mohammed Siraj

Power Players for LSG Vs Bangalore Match

After smashing a match-winning 103 against Mumbai, KL Rahul will be brimming with confidence. The LSG skipper will go hard in the powerplay.

Dinesh Karthik is enjoying a dream run with the willow in this edition. Out of six innings, he has been dismissed only once. His scores read 66*, 34, 7*, 44*, 14*, and 32*.

Regardless of the situation, Glenn Maxwell will go hell for leather. We saw how he rescued his side against Delhi with a quickfire 55 off 34. In addition to his explosive batting, he can also be called upon to break partnerships.

Barring a single-digit score against Hyderabad, Quinton de Kock has been very effective with the bat. He averages 41 in five innings, including the highest score of 80. With the gloves, he has inflicted 4 dismissals.

Smart Picks for LSG Vs Bangalore Match

Avesh Khan can spray the ball around, but he is still the leading wicket-taker (11 at 17.09) for Lucknow.

Wanindu Hasaranga hasn’t gone wicketless in a single game thus far. He has bagged 11 wickets in this edition.

It will be interesting to see how the free-flowing LSG top-order deals with the probing bowling of Josh Hazlewood. The Australian pacer finished with figures of 3 for 28 in his previous outing.

If Bangalore bowl first, Harshal Patel is likely to be amongst the wickets. He relies on his variations to deceive the batters in the slog overs.

The Lucknow Super Giants will pin hopes on Marcus Stoinis and Jason Holder. These two all-rounders can even bat higher up the order and also operate with both new and old ball.

Manish Pandey can be extremely annoying with his inconsistency. However, he showed promise in his innings of 38 in the last match against Mumbai.

Also Read:

Delhi vs Punjab Fantasy Cricket Tips

LSG Vs Bangalore Match Preview

Both teams have won four games and lost two in this edition. Although LSG and Bangalore are currently placed in the upper half of the points table, they cannot afford to get complacent. As far as this contest goes, Bangalore will need their marquee openers to fire on all cylinders. On the other hand, Lucknow will be hoping for another cohesive performance from their players.

Ready with your team? Start playing My11Circle fantasy cricket app NOW!
